titlePart.supplied: Short Statement on Family Planning and World Peace

sourceDesc.bibl: What Noted People Say, New Castle News, Apr. 12, 1939, p. 4

docBody.head: What Noted People Say

p.q: Margaret Sanger sees a hope for world peace in scientific birth control:

docBody.p: "Intelligent planning of population increase among nation is as essential to world peace and international welfare as family planning is essential to the welfare and happiness of individuals."
